pages.text: These wands allow placement of large amounts of materials. Hover over the side of a block to see a preview of where blocks of the $(l)same type$() will be placed against all identical connected blocks.$(br)More expensive wands have more durability and can place more blocks at once.$(br)$(thing)Placement Mode$() can be changed with $(k:bbw.key.mode). $(thing)Fluid Placement Mode$() can be changed with $(k:bbw.key.fluidmode).
Durability: 250 $(br)Max blocks to place: 9 $(br2)Vertical and Horizontal Placement Mode only, cannot change Fluid Mode.
Durability: 1561 $(br)Max blocks to place: 1561 $(br2)All Placement and Fluid modes available.
Durability: Infinite $(br)Max blocks to place: 4096 $(br2)Combine two of these to double the number of blocks it can place, up to a max of 16384.$(br2)All Placement and Fluid modes available.
